Player History
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Oakland in 1968...
Injured on 5/10/1971 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1973, off Randy Jones (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1973, off Gene Garber (TEX)...
Injured on 5/8/1973 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 6/2/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/16/1979 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for full season...
Injured on 4/18/1983 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/1983 with a Fractured Hand, out for 8 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1985...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/23/1988, off Jose DeLeon (DET)...
